title: Nerf Fizz trickster cooldown already...
body:
This pain in the a­** champion already buy 40% cooldown reduction, why he is still allowed to have an ability at 16-10 second, reduced to 6 second with cooldown reduction,  to be untargetable, double tap Dash , AoE and deal a fair amount of damage in same time ?(270+75% AP level 5)

He deserve a cooldown increase on such an ability since he already buy the cooldown cap with every item. He could use a nerf, Fizz is frustrating to face as most of his spell is targeted and fairly easy to land. Make it possible to trade or catch him as the game goes on.

Why does Fizz need nerfs?

He needs nerfs because it's well known that at lvl 6 building no items he can 100-0 you. Second, you can only zone him until lvl 3 and then he easily dashes through to you if you even attempt to farm. Third his invincibility is far too forgiving as it's the whole animation not just when he is on top of the trident, so there's almost no mage who can stun him as most stuns are pretty telegraphed. Finally all of this kit does damage and an absurd amount at that.

> He needs nerfs because it's well known that at lvl 6 building no items he can 100-0 you.

Except he can't. If he could, people would pick him in high elo and competitive play, but they don't.

> Second, you can only zone him until lvl 3 and then he easily dashes through to you if you even attempt to farm. 

You can zone him while his dashes are on cooldown.

> Third his invincibility is far too forgiving as it's the whole animation not just when he is on top of the trident, so there's almost no mage who can stun him as most stuns are pretty telegraphed.

It's a high cooldown and he's melee. You can stun him if you bait out his E.

> Finally all of this kit does damage and an absurd amount at that.
